pay(uint256).details: Make sure to check the msg.sender.

params.amount: Amount owed due to reactive transactions and/or callbacks.

params.log: Data structure containing the information about the intercepted log record.

coverDebt().notice: Automatically cover the outstanding debt to the system contract or callback proxy, provided the contract has sufficient funds.

pause().notice: Pauses the reactive contract by unsubscribing from events using the criteria provided by the implementation.

pay(uint256).notice: Method called by the system contract and/or proxies when payment is due.

react((uint256,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Entry point for handling new event notifications.

resume().notice: Resumed the reactive contract by subscribing to events using the criteria provided by the implementation.
